group_1.textCenter: Iroha.
Big Sis...
Sis!
Sis♪
I can't bring myself to believe it...@I... I searched so hard, and you're...

group_1.textRight: Iroha!

group_1.textLeft: *Sob* Sana... I think Eve is... I think@Eve is Ui.
She has to be... The Eternal Sakura bloomed.

group_1.narration: I'd always thought that if I reunite with Ui,@she'd be just like she was in my memories.

group_1.textCenter: Why...why did it have to be like this?

group_1.textRight: *Wheeze* *Gasp*

group_1.textCenter: Oh, to see you like this...breathless and@exhausted, as le calamità draws near...
*Giggle* Blondie!
Your life, right now...
Is the most brilliant and bella it's ever@been!

group_1.textRight: Huh?!
Can you speak in the right language for once?@I never know what the hell you're saying.

group_1.textLeft: And I can't stand you giggling away while@my friends are suffering!

group_1.textCenter: Hmph. I, Alina, am also irritated with what@you're doing.
I wish to visit Eve, yet you two are standing@in my path.

group_1.textLeft: Of course we are!
It's bad news for everyone if someone breaks@Eve out!

group_1.textRight: Yeah!
And there's no way we're lettin' you anywhere@NEAR Walpurgisnacht!

group_1.textCenter: [flashEffect:explosion]*Chuckle*

group_1.textRight: Ohhh gosh... R-R-R-Renaaa...
That was...an Uwasa, wasn't it? It faded away@in seconds, but...
It just jumped out of her book...

group_1.textLeft: Of course that's what it was! Come on, you're@not blind or anything!

group_1.textRight: W-well, yeah, but still!

group_1.textLeft: I knew she could make [textBlue:Rumors], but I didn't@know she could summon them, too.

group_1.textCenter: I need only craft a [textBlue:Rumor] once for it to be@recorded in the pages of my tome.
With the foundations of it written down, I@barely need to use any magic to reform it.
I do not especially need the [textBlue:Rumors] to be@permanent when using them to attack.
This allows me to avoid carving off more of@my life, and fight while conserving magic.

group_1.textLeft: That's so unfair!
We can't get anywhere near her with those@horrible little pets of hers.

group_1.textRight: But we've got to stop her somehow!

group_1.textCenter: I welcome your best efforts, provided we can@end this quickly.
I have no time to waste, much less play@trivial games with you.

group_1.textLeft: Wait, you guys are already tired?

group_1.textRight: *Pant* *Pant*

group_1.textLeft: You need to get those endorphins pumping@to keep fighting!

group_1.textRight: She's got so much magic we can't even get@close to her...
Yes, I hate to admit it, but this will take@more than just the three of us...
You're not going to save Magical Girls with@a mass of impurities like that.
When Eve comes down from the mountain@it will trample Kamihama into dust.
And when it clashes with Walpurgisnacht,@we'll be that much closer to annihilation.

group_1.textLeft: That annihilation will serve a purpose.@It will stimulate people's emotions.
And from those emotions energy will be @born. Energy that will help Eve hatch.
What does that leave, when it's all over?@Not destruction!
Hope!

group_1.textRight: Frail hope, that can crumble to dust in@seconds!
Even if you do indeed change our fates, and@all of our burdens disappear...
Sooner or later people will realize the@price that was paid to achieve that.
Then the hope those girls clung to will @become a hideous guilt-ridden power.
One that will eat away at their souls.
Do you think the Magical Girls who are@working as Feathers can withstand that?

group_1.textLeft: We'll be living in a world where no one can@turn into a Witch, so why worry about it?

group_1.textRight: So you're going to have them suffer@with those consequences for all time?!

group_1.textLeft: Only the Feathers will have to suffer.
It's got nothing to do with all the Magical@Girls who know nothing about it.
And it doesn't change the fact that future@Magical Girls will be saved.

group_1.textRight: You...!

group_1.textLeft: There, are we good now?
Whine whine whine all you want, it's not@gonna change anything!
This plan is going to succeed. We've already@made sure of that!

group_1.textCenter: Yachiyo! She's going to attack again!
Stop trying to change her mind!

group_1.textLeft: Anyway, I'm off to go break the chains@holding back Eve.

group_1.textRight: Wait!

group_1.textLeft: [flashEffect:flashWhite2][bgEffect:shakeLarge][surround:1007A01]Big Baaaaaang!!!
Yachiyo!

group_1.textRight: It's not looking good over there either...

group_1.textLeft: We haven't had even a minute to rest, but@the Magius have hardly used any magic...

group_1.textCenter: Mhe Mhe Mhe Mhe

group_1.textRight: Great, here comes another one!
[flashEffect:flashWhite2][bgEffect:shakeLarge][surround:2004A09]Can you quit bombarding us for one second?!@I swear!

group_1.textLeft: Mhe?!
Can we find a way to open a path to everyone@else so we can help them?

group_1.textRight: That ain't a bad idea.
Iroha and Sana are already off on their way@to Eve.
We don't have time to be clownin' around@with these damn Familiars!

group_1.textCenter: Hobwheh hwih!

group_1.textRight: All right, let's wipe them out and go help@the others!

group_1.textLeft: Indeed, let's! I'll blow a hole in the wall @of Familiars!
